English:
[c][019245][b]Welcome to HWS+ | The Creative Scenario[/b][-][/c]

With this Scenario you have the latest [c][fdb100]HWS+ Configs[-][/c] and other files included that helps you to create structures that work on [c][fdb100]HWS+ EU / NA[-][/c].
For more information go here:
[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-config-effectiveness-weapon-system-ews/9161][u][c][019245]https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-config-effectiveness-weapon-system-ews/9161[-][/c][/u][/url]

Enjoy and if you have issues or feedback go here please:
[c][019245][u][url=https://github.com/B-iggy/HWS-Plus-Creative-Scenario]https://github.com/B-iggy/HWS-Plus-Creative-Scenario[/url][/u][-][/c]
[u][/u]
[i]Note: if you want to switch between Creative and Survival mode open the console and execute "cm".[/i][i][/i]
[i][/i]
[i]See you on [c][019245][b]HWS+[/b][-][/c]![/i]
[i][c][fdb100][sub]RexXxuS[/sub][-][/c][/i]

To compete in HWS+, you have to learn the EWS² terminology. For that the EWS² helps quite good.
[c][ffffff][b]Remember:[/b][-][/c] behind your cockpit in the Elemental Ship is a graphic showing you which Element is effective against what.
To compete in [c][019245]HWS+[-][/c], you have to learn the [c][ffffff]EWS²[-][/c] terminology. For that the EWS² Wall in front of you helps quite good.\n\nGood Luck!
